entry.title: $1775 // 2b/2b w Ensuite Bathroom, Private Roofdeck, Penthouse, 1 block to L/M
entry.content:
- This is a lease takeover. Current lease ends Oct 31, 2019.

- 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom penthouse with private roofdeck.

- Available room has ensuite bathroom, overlooks the roofdeck and entire skyline!

- Current roommate is a software engineer at a tech company.

- Just 1 block from L/M at Myrtle/Wyckoff.

MORE FUN - MORE FUN - MORE FUN - MORE FUN

The common rooftop is a lot of fun in the warmer months and we've hosted many BBQs and parties. You can easily fit up to 100 people! We also started a private Facebook Group for residents of the building and it's a really nice community vibe.

The building features bike storage, a laundry room, common lounge, amazingly huge rooftop with two giant gas grills, extra storage room, live-in super, garage with parking, and more!

The building is called The Mill (16-26 Madison Street), a new luxury building in Ridgewood. There's also a giant supermarket on the corner, Food Bazaar, and a lot of wonderful coffee shops, restaurants, and bars nearby.

You can check out the building's website: www.themillridgewood.com

I've attached the floor plan, some stock images from the building, and some actual photos ðŸ™‚ Flexible on move-in date too.

Please send along some social media links (LinkedIn, Facebook) so we know you're real! Thanks!
